item.description: Come enjoy some and delicious and reasonably-priced Tex-Mex cuisine with your fellow FacStaffers at Rudy's in Teele Square, Somerville. One Yelp reviewer raved that Rudy's is: "My sentimental favorite in the area. I love this place so much, I purposefully moved into an apartment a block away." Well, you won't have to move your entire home to Teele Square in order to enjoy this great local gem, instead you can just attend the first-even Tufts Faculty-Staff Social Group Casual Friday Lunch.
item.how_to_find_us: I will hopefully remember to bring Jumbo and so I will more than likely be the only person in attendance who is carrying a little foam elephant.
item.name: Casual Friday Lunch
